title: Snow White & the Huntsman
writer: Evan Daugherty, John Lee Hancock, Hossein Amini
short_cast: Kristen Stewart, Chris Hemsworth, Charlize Theron, Sam Claflin, Sam Spruell, Ian McShane, Bob Hoskins, Ray Winstone, Nick Frost, Eddie Marsan, Toby Jones, Johnny Harris, Brian Gleeson
cast: Kristen Stewart, Chris Hemsworth, Charlize Theron, Sam Claflin, Sam Spruell, Ian McShane, Bob Hoskins, Ray Winstone, Nick Frost, Eddie Marsan, Toby Jones, Johnny Harris, Brian Gleeson
genre: US Movies, Movies Based on Books, Action & Adventure
m_desc: Suitable for persons aged 16 and above and under parental guidance for people under age of 16
desc: An updated take on the tale finds a young Snow White battling the Evil Queen with skills learned from the Huntsman sent to kill her.
